1/*.1/20: Processor architectures; Processor configuration, e.g. pipelining

3/*: Geometric image transformation in the plane of the image, e.g. from bit-mapped to bit-mapped creating a different image

3/*.3/20: Linear translation of a whole image or part thereof, e.g. panning
3/*.3/40: Scaling of a whole image or part thereof
3/*.3/60: Rotation of a whole image or part thereof

5/*: Image enhancement or restoration, e.g. from bit-mapped to bit-mapped creating a similar image

5/*.5/20: by the use of local operators
5/*.5/40: by the use of histogram techniques
5/*.5/50: by the use of more than one image, e.g. averaging, subtraction

7/*: Image analysis, e.g. from bit-mapped to non bit-mapped

7/*.7/60: Analysis of geometric attributes, e.g. area, centre of gravity, perimeter, from an image

9/*: Image coding, e.g. from bit-mapped to non bit-mapped

9/*.9/20: Contour coding, e.g. using detection of edges

11/*.11/20: Drawing from basic elements, e.g. lines or circles
11/*.11/40: Filling a planar surface by adding surface attributes, e.g. colour or texture
11/*.11/60: Editing figures and text; Combining figures or text
11/*.11/80: Creating or modifying a manually drawn or painted image using a manual input device, e.g. mouse, light pen, direction keys on keyboard

13/*.13/40: 3D of characters, e.g. humans, animals or virtual beings
13/*.13/60: 3D of natural phenomena, e.g. rain, snow, water or plants

17/*.17/10: Volume description, e.g. cylinders, cubes or using CSG [Constructive Solid Geometry]
17/*.17/20: Wire-frame description, e.g. polygonalisation or tessellation
17/*.17/30: Surface description, e.g. polynomial surface description

19/*: Manipulating 3D models or images for computer graphics

19/*.19/20: Editing of 3D images, e.g. changing shapes or colours, aligning objects or positioning parts
